mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, tenant_name, tm_userNames, harbor_projects, network_ids, k8s_pvs, k8s_namespaces, create_time, update_time, annotation, cluster_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from tenant_binding
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT username FROM user_tenant WHERE tenantid IN (SELECT tenant_id FROM tenant_binding WHERE tenant_name=#{tenantName})
SELECT * from tenant_binding WHERE cluster_id in (SELECT id FROM cluster)
mapper.update:
update tenant_binding
tenant_name = #{tenantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tm_userNames = #{tmUsernames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
harbor_projects = #{harborProjects,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
network_ids = #{networkIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
k8s_pvs = #{k8sPvs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
k8s_namespaces = #{k8sNamespaces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
annotation = #{annotation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tenant_binding WHERE tenant_id IN ( SELECT tenantid FROM user_tenant WHERE username=#{userName})
